statusDetails.message:
invalid selector
from javascript error: {"status":32,"value":"Unable to locate an element with the xpath expression //*[contains(text(),'Şifreyi değiştir') because of the following error:\nSyntaxError: Failed to execute 'evaluate' on 'Document': The string '//*[contains(text(),'Şifreyi değiştir')' is not a valid XPath expression."}

steps.name: Click on the 'E-posta adresiyle devam et' button
Check The Text For 'E-posta adresini gir'
Click on the current password input field and enter the password
Click on the new password input field and enter the new password
Click on the new password confirmation input field and enter the new password
